segment.source: Sharing Settings Location Templates with the UE-V Template Gallery
segment.target: Sharing Settings Location Templates with the UE-V Template Gallery

segment.source: Sharing Settings Location Templates with the UE-V Template Gallery
segment.target: Sharing Settings Location Templates with the UE-V Template Gallery

segment.source: Sharing Settings Location Templates with the UE-V Template Gallery
segment.target: Sharing Settings Location Templates with the UE-V Template Gallery

segment.source: Share location templates with the template gallery
segment.target: Share location templates with the template gallery

segment.source: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) template gallery allows administrators to share their UE-V settings location templates.
segment.target: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) template gallery allows administrators to share their UE-V settings location templates.

segment.source: In the gallery, you can upload your settings location templates for other people to use, and you can download templates that other people have created.
segment.target: In the gallery, you can upload your settings location templates for other people to use, and you can download templates that other people have created.

segment.source: The UE-V template gallery is located on Microsoft TechNet here: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246589.
segment.target: The UE-V template gallery is located on Microsoft TechNet here: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246589.

segment.source: Before you share a settings location template on the UE-V template gallery, make sure it does not contain any personal or company information.
segment.target: Before you share a settings location template on the UE-V template gallery, make sure it does not contain any personal or company information.

segment.source: You can use any XML viewer to open and view the contents of a settings location template file.
segment.target: You can use any XML viewer to open and view the contents of a settings location template file.

segment.source: The following template values should be reviewed before you share it with anyone outside your company.
segment.target: The following template values should be reviewed before you share it with anyone outside your company.

segment.source: Template Author Name – Specify a general, non-identifying name for the template author name or exclude this data from the template.
segment.target: Template Author Name – Specify a general, non-identifying name for the template author name or exclude this data from the template.

segment.source: Template Author Email – Specify a general, non-identifying template author email or exclude this data from the template.
segment.target: Template Author Email – Specify a general, non-identifying template author email or exclude this data from the template.

segment.source: Before you deploy any settings location template that you have downloaded from the UE-V gallery, you should first test the template to ensure that the application settings roam correctly in a test environment.
segment.target: Before you deploy any settings location template that you have downloaded from the UE-V gallery, you should first test the template to ensure that the application settings roam correctly in a test environment.
